docs.snippet: The company says it made more clear that postings and other personal data can be used in advertising on the site and reiterated that includes information from teenage users....
docs.lead_paragraph: The company says it made more clear that postings and other personal data can be used in advertising on the site and reiterated that includes information from teenage users.
docs.abstract: Facebook presses forward with official changes to its privacy policies, first proposed in August, that clarify that postings and other personal data can be used in advertising on the Web site; reiterates that includes information from teenage users as well.

headline.main: Facebook Reasserts Posts Can Be Used to Advertise
headline.print_headline: Facebook Reasserts Posts Can Be Used to Advertise

docs.snippet: Facebook has started an online gift service, hoping that the moneymaking potential of social gift giving will please its Wall Street investors....
docs.lead_paragraph: Facebook has started an online gift service, hoping that the moneymaking potential of social gift giving will please its Wall Street investors.
docs.abstract: Facebook starts online gift service, hoping the moneymaking potential of social gift giving will please its Wall Street investors after the company's dismal stock market debut; analysts issued more bullish projections in recent days, with the stock up 49 percent from its lowest point, closing at $26.15, still well below the initial offering price of $38.

headline.seo: Facebook Gift Store Urges Users to Shop While They Share
headline.main: With a Billion Birthdays on File, Facebook Adds a Gift Store

docs.snippet: In an effort to settle a pending class action suit, Facebook offers $10 to every user whose name and picture was used in a Sponsored Stories ad....
docs.abstract: In an effort to settle a pending class action suit, Facebook offers $10 to every user whose name and picture was used in a Sponsored Stories ad.

headline.main: Facebook Offers to Sweeten Deal to Settle 'Sponsored Stories' Suit

docs.snippet: Officials announced the indictments of 49 members of two rival Brooklyn gangs, called the Rockstarz and the Very Crispy Gangsters....
docs.lead_paragraph: Officials announced the indictments of 49 members of two rival Brooklyn gangs, called the Rockstarz and the Very Crispy Gangsters.
docs.abstract: New York City Police Commissioner Raymond W Kelly and Brooklyn District Attorney Charles J Hynes announce the indictments of 49 members of two rival gangs in the East New York section of Brooklyn; gangs, Rockstarz and the Very Crispy Gangsters, both used Facebook to stoke violence, taunt one another and boast of murders and other crimes, giving investigators a virtual map of their gang-related activities; charges include murder, attempted murder and conspiracy.

headline.seo: Brooklyn Gangs Boasted of Murders on Facebook, Police Say
headline.main: Facebook Friends Boasted of Gang War, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Facebook Friends Boasted Of Gang War, Police Say

docs.snippet: Facebook said on Monday that its chief operating officer, Sheryl Sandberg, has joined the social network's board, becoming the first woman to serve as a director for the company....
docs.abstract: Facebook said on Monday that its chief operating officer, Sheryl Sandberg, has joined the social network's board, becoming the first woman to serve as a director for the company.

headline.print_headline: Sandberg, Prominent Facebook Officer, Is Elevated to Its Board

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED
